statements: SELECT show_title, platform_name FROM show_availability WHERE rights_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM show_availability WHERE platform_name = 'Netflix';
SELECT show_id, show_title, rights_available FROM show_availability WHERE platform_name = 'Hulu' ORDER BY show_title ASC;
SELECT show_id, platform_name FROM show_availability ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT show_title FROM show_availability WHERE rights_available = FALSE LIMIT 3;
SELECT show_title, platform_name FROM show_availability WHERE rights_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM show_availability WHERE platform_name = 'Netflix';
SELECT show_title, platform_name FROM show_availability WHERE platform_name = 'Hulu' AND rights_available = TRUE;
SELECT show_title, platform_name FROM show_availability ORDER BY show_title DESC, platform_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shows FROM show_availability GROUP BY platform_name;
SELECT * FROM show_availability
SELECT show_name, platform_name, available FROM show_availability WHERE platform_name = 'Netflix'
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM platform_info WHERE region = 'US'
SELECT show_name FROM show_availability ORDER BY show_name ASC
SELECT show_name, available FROM show_availability WHERE available = TRUE
SELECT show_id, show_name, platform_name, available FROM show_availability WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type, region FROM platform_info WHERE region = 'USA';
SELECT show_id, show_name, platform_name, available FROM show_availability WHERE platform_name = 'Netflix';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type, region FROM platform_info WHERE platform_type = 'Streaming';
SELECT show_name, platform_name FROM show_availability INNER JOIN platform_info ON show_availability.platform_name = platform_info.platform_name;
SELECT * FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM TVShows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, platform_name FROM TVShows INNER JOIN Platforms ON TVShows.platform = Platforms.platform_name;
SELECT show_name, platform_name FROM TVShows INNER JOIN Platforms ON TVShows.platform = Platforms.platform_name WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT show_name, platform_name, start_date FROM TVShows INNER JOIN Rights ON TVShows.show_id = Rights.show_id INNER JOIN Platforms ON Rights.platform_id = Platforms.platform_name ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT show_name, platform, release_date FROM TVShows WHERE platform='Netflix' ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM TVShows INNER JOIN Rights ON TVShows.show_id = Rights.show_id WHERE Rights.end_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY TVShows.show_name ASC, Rights.start_date;
SELECT show_name, platform, start_date, end_date FROM TVShows LEFT JOIN Rights ON TVShows.show_id = Rights.show_id WHERE platform='HBO Max' AND end_date IS NULL ORDER BY show_name;
SELECT platform, COUNT(show_id) AS show_count FROM Rights GROUP BY platform HAVING COUNT(show_id) > 5 ORDER BY show_count DESC;

SELECT platform_name, release_date FROM TVShows INNER JOIN Platforms ON TVShows.platform = Platforms.platform_name WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY platform_name, release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM TVShows;
SELECT show_title, release_year FROM TVShows WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT show_title, platform_name FROM TVShows JOIN Platforms ON TVShows.platform = Platforms.platform_name;
SELECT show_title, platform_name FROM TVShows JOIN Platforms ON TVShows.platform = Platforms.platform_name WHERE Platforms.country = 'USA';

SELECT show_title, start_date, end_date FROM TVShows JOIN StreamingRights ON TVShows.show_id = StreamingRights.show_id JOIN Availability ON StreamingRights.right_id = Availability.right_id WHERE Availability.available = TRUE;
SELECT show_title, release_year, platform FROM TVShows WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY show_title ASC;
SELECT show_title, release_year, platform_name AS platform FROM TVShows JOIN Platforms ON TVShows.platform = Platforms.platform_id WHERE country = 'USA';

SELECT show_title, release_year, platform_name AS platform FROM TVShows JOIN StreamingRights ON TVShows.show_id = StreamingRights.show_id JOIN Platforms ON StreamingRights.platform_id = Platforms.platform_id WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';

SELECT platform_name AS platform, COUNT(show_id) AS total_shows FROM StreamingRights JOIN Platforms ON StreamingRights.platform_id = Platforms.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name HAVING COUNT(show_id) > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_available FROM Availability WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows;
SELECT show_name, platform, start_date FROM tv_shows ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, platform, start_date FROM tv_shows WHERE platform = 'Netflix';
SELECT show_name, start_date, end_date FROM tv_shows WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT platform_name, country FROM platforms WHERE country IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM tv_shows WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, platform FROM tv_shows WHERE platform = 'Netflix' ORDER BY show_name ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.platform_name FROM users u JOIN subscriptions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN platforms p ON s.platform_id = p.platform_id WHERE u.country = 'USA' ORDER BY p.platform_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(show_id) AS total_shows, platform FROM tv_shows GROUP BY platform HAVING total_shows > 5 ORDER BY total_shows DESC;

SELECT u.username, s.start_date AS subscription_start, s.end_date AS subscription_end, p.platform_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN subscriptions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN platforms p ON s.platform_id = p.platform_id WHERE u.age > 20 AND u.country != 'UK';
